channel.title: [PI] Removing Character interface upon login
channel.description: I followed a tutorial on adding game modes. When you login for the first time you choose your difficulty but the Character creation interface cancels it out which is very annoying. Does anyone know how to remove the interface when you login for the first time?

item.title: [PI] Removing Character interface upon login
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

check the starter method in playerassistant.java
